Those who have despised the Word of God will then face the Author of the inspired oracles. We cannot afford 
                                                                           561
to live with no reference to the day of judgment; for though long delayed, it is now near, even at the door, and hasteth greatly. The trumpet of the Archangel will soon startle the living and wake the dead. At that day the wicked will be separated from the just, as the shepherd divides the goats from the sheep.
